mapper.select: select a.roomcode,a.name roomname,b.name typename,a.howmany,a.howmuch, b.typecode from room a,roomtype b where a.type=b.typecode
select * from where roomcode in (select roomcode from room minus select distinct roomcode from booking where to_char(checkout, 'YYYY-MM-DD')>#{param1} and #{param2}>to_char(checkin, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
select name, typecode from roomtype order by typecode
